metadata.title: Thursday, 21st November, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    why the Government built Ventilated Improved Pit Latrines before building classroom blocks and teachers’ houses at Kazombozombo Primary School site in Lukulu West Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b)    when funds will be allocated for the construction of classroom blocks and teachers’ houses at the School.
(a)    when Sesheke Police Station will be renovated;
(b)    when sanitation in the holding cells will be improved; and

(c)    when the Government will construct female and juvenile holding cells at the Police Station. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply:  Resumption of Debate: (Head 46/01: under consideration): (The Minister of Health). Heads 46/02, 46/05, 46/06, 46/07, 46/08, 46/09, 46/10, 46/11, 46/12, 46/13, 46/14, 46/15, 46/16, 46/17, 46/18, 46/19, 21/01, 37/01, 37/02, 37/04, 37/06, 37/07, 37/08, 37/09, 37/10, 37/11, 37/12, 37/13, 37/14, 20/04, 20/06, 20/09, 29/01, 29/03, 29/04, 29/05, 29/06, 29/07, 29/09 and 25/01 - for consideration.
